practiceAreas.label: Practice Areas

intro.title: Our Services
intro.description: Our office provides solutions to legal disputes with a strategic, meticulous, and results-oriented approach. Each case is handled considering the specific characteristics of the matter and current judicial practices; we provide effective and reliable legal support to our clients.

ticaretHukuku.title: Commercial Law
ticaretHukuku.shortDescription: Legal consulting in company formations, commercial contracts, unfair competition, and commercial receivables cases.
ticaretHukuku.description: We provide legal consulting and litigation services in company formations, preparation and amendment of articles of association, partnership disputes, share transfers, commercial contracts, unfair competition, commercial receivables and compensation cases, and all disputes of a commercial nature.
services: Preparation and Amendment of Articles of Association

sirketlerHukuku.title: Corporate Law
sirketlerHukuku.shortDescription: Capital transactions, share transfers, general assembly processes, and corporate structuring support.
sirketlerHukuku.description: We provide legal support regarding capital increase and decrease, share transfer transactions, general assembly and board of directors processes, internal company disputes, and corporate structuring.

sozlesmelerHukuku.title: Contract Law
sozlesmelerHukuku.shortDescription: Preparation, review, and dispute resolution of commercial and ordinary contracts.
sozlesmelerHukuku.description: We provide legal support for the preparation, review, and revision of all types of commercial and ordinary contracts, as well as resolution of disputes arising from contracts.

aileHukuku.title: Family Law
aileHukuku.shortDescription: Meticulous and client-focused representation in divorce, alimony, custody, and property regime liquidation.
aileHukuku.description: We adopt a meticulous and client-focused representation approach in divorce cases, alimony, custody, establishment of personal relationships, liquidation of property regime, and all disputes arising from family law.

mirasHukuku.title: Inheritance Law
mirasHukuku.shortDescription: Effective services in inheritance distribution, inheritance certificate, reduction, and fraudulent conveyance cases.
mirasHukuku.description: We provide effective legal services in inheritance distribution, inheritance certificates, inheritance contracts, reduction cases, cases based on fraudulent conveyance, and disputes arising from inheritance law.

borclarHukuku.title: Law of Obligations
borclarHukuku.shortDescription: Support in tort, unjust enrichment, and breach of contract disputes.
borclarHukuku.description: We provide legal support in disputes arising from tort, unjust enrichment, breach of contract, and debt relationships.

icraIflasHukuku.title: Enforcement and Bankruptcy Law
icraIflasHukuku.shortDescription: Execution of enforcement proceedings, attachment procedures, negative determination, and recovery cases.
icraIflasHukuku.description: We handle enforcement proceedings with and without judgments, attachment procedures, objections and complaints, negative determination and recovery cases, and disputes arising from enforcement law.

gayrimenkulKiraHukuku.title: Real Estate and Lease Law
gayrimenkulKiraHukuku.shortDescription: Real estate transactions, lease disputes, eviction, and title deed cases.
gayrimenkulKiraHukuku.description: We provide legal support in real estate purchase and sale transactions, lease disputes, eviction cases, title deed cancellation and registration cases, and disputes regarding property rights.

isHukuku.title: Labor Law
isHukuku.shortDescription: Employee-employer disputes, reinstatement, compensation, and employment contract consulting.
isHukuku.description: We provide legal consulting regarding disputes arising from employee and employer relationships, reinstatement cases, severance and notice compensation, preparation of employment contracts, and termination processes.

hukukiDanismanlik.title: Legal Consulting
hukukiDanismanlik.shortDescription: Risk analysis and process management services for individual and corporate clients.
hukukiDanismanlik.description: We provide regular legal consulting services to individual and corporate clients, including risk analysis before disputes arise, legal opinion formation, and process management.
